title: Favorite rock star/metal god
content: Who is your favorite rock star or metal godRorie

title: Re: Favorite rock star/metal god
content:
Till Lindemann from Ramms+ein. I don't consider him any god, though. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-cheeky.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Favorite rock star/metal god
